pdgm.pdgmnote: Heine1982 2.15.42.1. “The progressive consists of the verb in its infinitive form plus the auxiliary heey-.”
Heine1982 2.15.3. These affixes involve both a prefix and a suffix.
Heine1982 2.15.61. As paradigms show,“prefix verb –iraar- is being replace by largely synomymous suffix verb bood-.“
Heine1982 2.15.42.2 “There is no imperfect/perfect distinction in the habitual aspect.”

Heine1982 2.15.62. The suffix conjugation sub-classes are:I basic,II medial,III causative,IV nasal.
